description: This course provides a theoretical and practical foundation for assisting secondary readers. Students learn the essentials of good reading instruction and apply them in the making of a three-week literature unit. Required 10-hour field experience. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisites: EDUC 290 and EDUC 330, or permission of instructor.
name: Teaching Reading 5-12
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: EDUC 290 and EDUC 330, or permission of instructor.
